text: Good morning, im looking for a SMS app in the marketplace to send SMS to any country, and i tried Sakari SMS and Salesmsg SMS, but dont work. That apps only send sms to Canada and USA. Im wondoring if anyone has worked with another app for send SMS.
Tried Messagebird before and it works fine, there is a limitation to the SMS characters but I guess it is across all platforms.
Also ~ 2 years ago it was associated with Niswey just FYI not sure where they stand now :slightly_smiling_face:

Hi, I am creating an app and looking to have it listed at some point. However, I noticed that you need 3 active users on it. How can I get users on an app that is not yet listed? How can a user install the app if its not listed?
Just share the install link Inc scopes
